name: Caretes Orange
description:
Caretes is the latest fashion to dress your feet. Comfortable and light, they combine with different styles that will give you a completely fresh look and feel. 
Caretes reimagines the original design of the Valencian espardenyes, to create a shoe that is adapted to an urban and modern environment. 
As part of the reinvention of this classic, Caretes has added a rubber sole and customized the piece with ribbons in a large variety of colors that perfectly fit your feet.
Caretes is an unisex product and can be worn equally by men, women and children. So comfortable for the summer and perfect for the more adventurous in winter. 
Caretes is a 100% Valencian, handmade in the area and available to export to all countries.  Since the company started in July 2013, there has been interest from countries like Germany, France and Australia. 
Caretes is presented to the customer with a packaging inspired from the typical Valencian saquets.
